sn32:2.1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn32:2.1.3_0: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā valāhakakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjatī”ti?
sn32:2.1.4_0: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kāyena sucaritaṁ carati, vācāya sucaritaṁ carati, manasā sucaritaṁ carati.
sn32:2.1.8_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā valāhakakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn32:2.1.9_0: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā valāhakakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
sn32:2.1.10_0: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā valāhakakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjatī”ti.
sn32:3-12.1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn32:3-12.1.3_0: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sītavalāhakānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjatī”ti?
sn32:3-12.1.4_0: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kāyena sucaritaṁ carati, vācāya sucaritaṁ carati, manasā sucaritaṁ carati.
sn32:3-12.1.8_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sītavalāhakānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn32:3-12.1.11_0: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sītavalāhakānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
sn32:3-12.1.12_0: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sītavalāhakānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjatī”ti.
sn32:13-52.1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn32:13-52.1.3_0: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā uṇhavalāhakānaṁ devānaṁ …pe…
sn32:13-52.1.7_0: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kāyena sucaritaṁ carati, vācāya sucaritaṁ carati, manasā sucaritaṁ carati.
sn32:13-52.1.11_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā vassavalāhakānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn32:13-52.1.14_0: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā vassavalāhakānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
sn32:13-52.1.15_0: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā vassavalāhakānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjatī”ti.
sn32:53.1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn32:53.1.3_0: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā sītaṁ hotī”ti?
sn32:53.1.6_0: ‘yannūna mayaṁ sakāya ratiyā vaseyyāmā’ti, tesaṁ taṁ cetopaṇidhimanvāya sītaṁ hoti.
sn32:53.1.7_0: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, yenekadā sītaṁ hotī”ti.
sn32:54.1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn32:54.1.3_0: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā uṇhaṁ hotī”ti?
sn32:54.1.6_0: ‘yannūna mayaṁ sakāya ratiyā vaseyyāmā’ti, tesaṁ taṁ cetopaṇidhimanvāya uṇhaṁ hoti.
sn32:54.1.7_0: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, yenekadā uṇhaṁ hotī”ti.
sn32:55.1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn32:55.1.3_0: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā abbhaṁ hotī”ti?
sn32:55.1.6_0: ‘yannūna mayaṁ sakāya ratiyā vaseyyāmā’ti, tesaṁ taṁ cetopaṇidhimanvāya abbhaṁ hoti.
sn32:55.1.7_0: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, yenekadā abbhaṁ hotī”ti.
sn32:56.1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn32:56.1.3_0: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā vāto hotī”ti?
sn32:56.1.6_0: ‘yannūna mayaṁ sakāya ratiyā vaseyyāmā’ti, tesaṁ taṁ cetopaṇidhimanvāya vāto hoti.
sn32:56.1.7_0: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, yenekadā vāto hotī”ti.
sn32:57.1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn32:57.1.3_0: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā devo vassatī”ti?
sn32:57.1.6_0: ‘yannūna mayaṁ sakāya ratiyā vaseyyāmā’ti, tesaṁ taṁ cetopaṇidhimanvāya devo vassati.
sn32:57.1.7_0: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, yenekadā devo vassatī”ti.
